definition: a line (as of rope or chain) by which an animal is fastened so as to restrict its range of movement
a line to which someone or something is attached (as for security)
examples: A crewman can clip the tether of his harness to the [safety line] and leave it clipped as he makes his way forward and aft.

definition: the limit of one's strength or resources
examples: I'm at the end of my tether.

definition: to fasten or restrain by or as if by a tether
examples: felt tethered to her desk until the work was done
